Trade/Device Name(s): BD Phoenix™M Automated Microbiology System - Vancomycin (0.5-32 μg/mL)
BD Phoenix™ Automated Microbiology System- Vancomycin (0.5-32 μg/mL) - Gram Positive ID/AST or AST only Phoenix Panels and update to the BD Phoenix Software through Version 6.01
Regulation Name(s): Fully Automated Short-Term Incubation Cycle Antimicrobial Susceptibility System
Specimen Type(s): Pure culture isolates of gram positive bacteria
Gram-negative aerobic and facultative anaerobic bacteria
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD Phoenix Automated Microbiology System modification for Vancomycin MIC testing with updated software through Version 6.01
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative determination of antimicrobial susceptibility by MIC for most gram-negative aerobic and facultative anaerobic bacteria (Enterobacteriaceae, NonEnterobacteriaceae) and gram-positive bacteria (Staphylococcus, Enterococcus, Streptococcus) from pure culture, specifically for Vancomycin algorithm update and software upgrade.
